attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should poor inocent animals be tested on , its crule and theire is no need animals shouldnt be treeted diffrent just because they cant talk and theire is no way anyone would test on humans so why do it on animals that cant do nothing about it and have to put up with having dozens of needles stuck into them or tablets shuved down theire throught !! please just stop it its crule
